    • Constructor Detail

      • Tombstone

        public Tombstone​(int health,
                 boolean isEnemy)
        The most basic constructor for the Tombstone class
        Parameters:
        health - The amount of health the Tombstone has
        isEnemy - Whether the Tombstone and its Skeleton belongs to the enemy

      • Tombstone

        public Tombstone​(int health,
                 boolean isEnemy,
                 int cooldown)
        Similar to above but the cooldown between Skeleton summonings is customizable
        Parameters:
        health - The amount of health the Tombstone has
        isEnemy - Whether the Tombstone belongs to the enemy
        cooldown - How many acts between each Skeleton summoning
